title: Need Help Identifying this Font
content:
Any idea what this font is?  
Is it something I can get for free?  
Or do you have a similar font that can be downloaded for free?

Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Page Sample.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20090330135558/http:/typophile.com/cms/files/Page%20Sample.JPG) | 4.15 KB |

 [‹ Luxardo lettering sans or similar typographies](http://web.archive.org/web/20090330135558/http:/typophile.com/cms/node/56344 "Go to previous forum topic") [Bouncy script font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20090330135558/http:/typophile.com/cms/node/56350 "Go to next forum topic")
author: xsalt

comments.content: It may be in this list of [comic strip fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20090330135558/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontcase/applications/comic_books_speech_balloons/&sample_text=HJPQSV%20-%207%20MORE%20POPULAR&sample_size=20). You’ll find comic lettering fonts for free, but they won’t be as good.
